title: US HB1064
caption: Ensuring Military Readiness Act of 2023
description: To provide requirements related to the eligibility of transgender individuals from serving in the Armed Forces.

title: US HB1112
caption: Ensuring Military Readiness Act of 2023
description: To provide requirements related to the eligibility of individuals who identify as transgender from serving in the Armed Forces.

title: US HB1276
caption: Protect Minors from Medical Malpractice Act of 2023
description: To protect children from medical malpractice in the form of gender transition procedures.

title: US HB1399
caption: Protect Children’s Innocence Act
description: To amend chapter 110 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit gender affirming care on minors, and for other purposes.

title: US HB1490
caption: Preventing Violence Against Female Inmates Act of 2023
description: To secure the dignity and safety of incarcerated women.

title: US HB1585
caption: Prohibiting Parental Secrecy Policies In Schools Act of 2023
description: To require a State receiving funds pursuant to title II of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to implement a State policy to prohibit a school employee from conducting certain social gender transition interventions.

title: US HB216
caption: My Child, My Choice Act of 2023
description: To prohibit Federal education funds from being provided to elementary schools that do not require teachers to obtain written parental consent prior to teaching lessons specifically related to gender identity, sexual orientation, or transgender studies, and for other purposes.

title: US HB3101
caption: TPA Act Traditional Passport Act
description: To prohibit the issuance of a passport with any gender designation other than "male" or "female", and for other purposes.

title: US HB3102
caption: TSA Act Traditional Screening Application Act
description: To prohibit the Transportation Security Administration from using the "X" gender designation in the TSA PreCheck advanced security program, and for other purposes.

title: US HB3328
caption: Protecting Children From Experimentation Act of 2023
description: To amend chapter 110 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit gender transition procedures on minors, and for other purposes.

title: US HB3329
caption: End Taxpayer Funding of Gender Experimentation Act of 2023
description: To prohibit taxpayer-funded gender transition procedures, and for other purposes.

title: US HB3462
caption: Empower Parents to Protect Their Kids Act of 2023
description: To require elementary schools and secondary schools that receive Federal funds to obtain parental consent before facilitating a child's gender transition in any form, and for other purposes.

title: US HB3887
caption: Children’s Hospital GME Support Reauthorization Act of 2023
description: To amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the program of payments to children's hospitals that operate graduate medical education programs, and for other purposes.

title: US HB429
caption: No Tax Breaks for Radical Corporate Activism Act
description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the trade or business expense deduction for the reimbursement of employee costs of child gender transition procedure or travel to obtain an abortion.

title: US HB4365
caption: Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2024
description: Making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2024, and for other purposes.

title: US HB4367
caption: Department of Homeland Security Appropriations Act, 2024
description: Making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2024, and for other purposes.

title: US HB4398
caption: Patriotism Not Pride Act
description: To prohibit certain Federal activity with respect to the promotion of Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, Queer, and Intersex Pride Month and the display of flags representing sexual orientation or gender identity on Federal property or grounds, and for other purposes.

title: US HB4665
caption: Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2024
description: Making appropriations for the Department of State, foreign operations, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2024, and for other purposes.

title: US HB4821
caption: Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2024
description: Making appropriations for the Department of the Interior, environment, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2024, and for other purposes.

title: US HB5
caption: Parents Bill of Rights Act
description: To ensure the rights of parents are honored and protected in the Nation's public schools.

title: US HB5327
caption: Empowering Parents Act
description: To establish a private right of action for parents with respect to the teaching of racial discrimination theory and other actions by covered schools, and for other purposes.

title: US HB5636
caption: Protect Children’s Innocence Act
description: To amend chapter 110 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit gender affirming care on minors.

title: US HB5893
caption: Commerce, Justice, Science, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2024
description: Making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce and Justice, Science, and Related Agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2024, and for other purposes.

title: US HB5894
caption: Department of Education Appropriations Act, 2024 Department of Health and Human Services Appropriations Act, 2024 Department of Labor Appropriations Act, 2024
description: Making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2024, and for other purposes.

title: US HB6040
caption: Protecting Our Kids from Harmful Research Act
description: To prohibit the use of Federal funds for gender transition in minors.

title: US HB6258
caption: GUARD Act Guaranteeing Unalienable and Anatomical Rights for Dependents Act
description: To amend the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to disqualify any State that discriminates against parents or guardians who oppose medical, surgical, pharmacological, psychological treatment, or clothing and social changes related to affirming the subjective claims of gender identity expressed by any minor if such claimed identity is inconsistent with such minor's biological sex from receiving funding under such Act.

title: US HB6658
caption: SAFE Home Act Sensible Adoption For Every Home Act
description: To prohibit entities receiving Federal assistance that are involved in adoption or foster care placements from delaying or denying placements under certain conditions.

title: US HB6728
caption: Save Women’s Sports Act of 2023
description: To require public school, and public institution of higher education, athletic teams and clubs to be designated for membership based on biological sex, and for other purposes.

title: US HB7183
caption: PROTECTS Act of 2024 Protecting Resources Of Taxpayers to Eliminate Childhood Transgender Surgeries Act of 2024
description: To prohibit Federal funds from being used to provide certain gender transition procedures to minors.

title: US HB7187
caption: Protection of Women in Olympic and Amateur Sports Act
description: To modify eligibility requirements for amateur sports governing organizations.

title: US HB734
caption: Protection of Women and Girls in Sports Act of 2023
description: To amend the Education Amendments of 1972 to provide that for purposes of determining compliance with title IX of such Act in athletics, sex shall be recognized based solely on a person's reproductive biology and genetics at birth.

title: US HB736
caption: PROTECT Kids Act Parental Rights Over The Education and Care of Their Kids Act
description: To require elementary and middle schools that receive Federal funds to obtain parental consent before changing a minor child's gender markers, pronouns, or preferred name on any school form or allowing a child to change the child's sex-based accommodations, including locker rooms or bathrooms.

title: US HB7725
caption: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to prohibit graduate medical schools from receiving Federal financial assistance if such schools adopt certain policies and requirements relating to diversity, equity, and inclusion.
description: No graduate medical school at an institution of higher education shall be eligible to receive funds or any other form of financial assistance under any Federal program, including participation in any federally funded or guaranteed student loan program, unless the institution certifies to the Secretary that the institution does not, and will not, do any of the following: [...] (4) Establish, maintain, or contract with a diversity, equity, and inclusion office, or any other functional equivalent of such an office, to serve the medical school. (5) Require or incentivize an individual to complete a diversity statement professing or adhering to diversity, equity, and inclusion as a condition of, or benefit in, admission or employment at such school.

title: US HB8070
caption: Servicemember Quality of Life Improvement and National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2025
description: To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2025 for military activities of the Department of Defense, for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.

title: US HB8433
caption: Abolishing Woke Awards for Research and Development Act of 2024
description: To amend the Public Health Service Act to require the National Institutes of Health to select awardees based on merit, and for other purposes.

title: US HB8580
caption: Military Construction, Veterans Affairs, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2025
description: Making appropriations for military construction, the Department of Veterans Affairs, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

title: US HB8708
caption: Eliminate DEI in Colleges Act
description: To prohibit Federal funding for institutions of higher education that carry out diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives, and for other purposes.

title: US HB8752
caption: Department of Homeland Security Appropriations Act, 2025
description: Making appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

title: US HB8771
caption: Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2025
description: Making appropriations for the Department of State, foreign operations, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

title: US HB8774
caption: Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2025
description: Making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

title: US HB8997
caption: Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2025
description: Making appropriations for energy and water development and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

caption: Department of the Interior, Environment, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2025
description: Making appropriations for the Department of the Interior, environment, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

caption: Science Appropriations Act, 2025 Department of Justice Appropriations Act, 2025 Department of Commerce Appropriations Act, 2025
description: Making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce and Justice, Science, and Related Agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

caption: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2025
description: Making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

title: US HB9028
caption: Department of Transportation Appropriations Act, 2025 Department of Housing and Urban Development Appropriations Act, 2025
description: Making appropriations for the Departments of Transportation, and Housing and Urban Development, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

title: US HB9029
caption: Department of Education Appropriations Act, 2025 Department of Health and Human Services Appropriations Act, 2025 Department of Labor Appropriations Act, 2025
description: Making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2025, and for other purposes.

title: US HB9218
caption: Defining Male and Female Act of 2024
description: To establish a clear and consistent biological definition of male and female.

title: US HB9586
caption: To prohibit Federal funds from being used to provide certain gender transition procedures to individuals in the custody of the Department of Homeland Security and the Department of Health and Human Services.
description: PROHIBITING FEDERAL FUNDS FROM BEING USED TO PROVIDE CERTAIN GENDER TRANSITION PROCEDURES. [...] no Federal funds may be used or otherwise made available to provide or refer for a specified gender transition procedure to an individual in the custody of the Department of Homeland Security or the Department of Health and Human Services or to reimburse any entity for providing such a procedure to such an individual.

title: US HB985
caption: Productivity Over Pronouns Act
description: To prohibit the use of Federal funds in any program, project, or activity of any agency in the Executive Branch to provide principles, resources, or specific suggestions for gender neutral or inclusive language or inclusive communication principles to help inform an inclusive approach to carrying out any such program, project, and activity.

title: US HJR160
caption: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Health and Human Services relating to "Nondiscrimination in Health Programs and Activities".
description: Resolved by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled, That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Department of Health and Human Services relating to "Nondiscrimination in Health Programs and Activities" (89 Fed. Reg. 37522 (May 6, 2024)), and such rule shall have no force or effect.

title: US HJR165
caption: Providing for congressional disapproval under chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, of the rule submitted by the Department of Education relating to "Nondiscrimination on the Basis of Sex in Education Programs or Activities Receiving Federal Financial Assistance".
description: That Congress disapproves the rule submitted by the Department of Education relating to "Nondiscrimination on the Basis of Sex in Education Programs or Activities Receiving Federal Financial Assistance" (89 Fed. Reg. 33474; published April 29, 2024), and such rule shall have no force or effect.

title: US HR115
caption: Establishing a Women's Bill of Rights to reaffirm legal protections afforded to women under Federal law.
description: N/a

title: US HR1223
caption: Designating October, 10, 2024, as "American Girls in Sports Day".
description: Whereas October 10th, as represented by the Roman numerals "XX", signifies the female XX chromosomes: Now, therefore, be it Resolved, That the Senate—  (1) recognizes October 10, 2024, as "American 2 Girls in Sports Day" [...] calls on sports-governing bodies in the United States and abroad to protect biological women and girls in sports.

title: US HR282
caption: Expressing that compelled political litmus tests used by public institutions to require individuals to identify with specific ideological views are directly at odds with the principles of academic freedom and free speech and in violation of the First Amendment of the Constitution.
description: That the House of Representatives condemns public institutions of higher education for conditioning admission to any student applicant, or the hiring, reappointment, or promotion of any faculty member, on the applicant or faculty member [...] making a pledge or statement regarding diversity, equity, and inclusion, or related topics

title: US HR298
caption: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 734) to amend the Education Amendments of 1972 to provide that for purposes of determining compliance with title IX of such Act in athletics, sex shall be recognized based solely on a person's reproductive biology and genetics at birth, and providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 42) disapproving the action of the District of Columbia Council in approving the Comprehensive Policing and Justice Reform Amendment Act of 2022.
description: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 734) to amend the Education Amendments of 1972 to provide that for purposes of determining compliance with title IX of such Act in athletics, sex shall be recognized based solely on a person’s reproductive biology and genetics at birth

title: US HR518
caption: Pushing back against the labeling of attempts by parents to ensure school curriculum and sports are age and sex appropriate as extreme.
description: Pushing back against the labeling of attempts by parents to ensure school curriculum and sports are age and sex appropriate as extreme. Whereas all students should feel welcome in their classroom, but radical far-left ideas inappropriate for minors should not; Whereas it is not extreme or hateful to believe children as young as 6 should not be subject to discussion about sexual orientation or gender ideology in the classroom; Whereas it is not extreme or hateful to believe biological men should not compete against biological women in sports;

title: US HR536
caption: Supporting the designation of the week including June 23, 2023, as "National Women's Sports Week" to celebrate the anniversary of the passage of title IX and the growth of women's sports.
description: Whereas title IX’s purpose and benefit are negated for women whenever men claiming to be women are granted access to female sports;

title: US HR769
caption: Expressing support for the designation of October 10, 2023, as "Real Women's Day".
description: Whereas October 10th is symbolized by the Roman numerals "XX": Now, therefore, be it Resolved, That the House of Representatives— (1) opposes forcing biological women and girls to compete against biological boys and men in girls' and women's sports; (2) opposes the weakening of Title IX protections; and (3) supports the designation of a "Real Women's Day".
